scripts.pack:feathers:all: npm run pack:feathers && npm run pack:feathers-rest && npm run pack:feathers-socketio && npm run pack:feathers-socketio && npm run pack:feathers-primus && npm run pack:feathers-hooks && npm run pack:feathers-auth && npm run pack:feathers-client
scripts.pack:feathers: cd node_modules/feathers && npm i && npm run compile && rmdir node_modules /s /q && cd ../..
scripts.pack:feathers-rest: cd node_modules/feathers-rest && npm i && npm run compile&& rmdir node_modules /s /q && cd ../..
scripts.pack:feathers-socketio: cd node_modules/feathers-socketio && npm i && npm run compile&& rmdir node_modules /s /q && cd ../..
scripts.pack:feathers-primus: cd node_modules/feathers-primus && npm i && npm run compile&& rmdir node_modules /s /q && cd ../..
scripts.pack:feathers-hooks: cd node_modules/feathers-hooks && npm i && npm run compile&& rmdir node_modules /s /q && cd ../..
scripts.pack:feathers-auth: cd node_modules/feathers-authentication-client && npm i && npm run compile&& rmdir node_modules /s /q && cd ../..
scripts.pack:feathers-client: cd node_modules/feathers-client && npm i && npm run compile && rmdir node_modules /s /q && cd ../..
